long_description: Made for all-day, everyday wearability, the women's Smith Lyric sunglasses combine nostalgic style with modern refinement and dependable, sun-blocking performance. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Brown-tint lenses enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nose pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: Made for all-day, everyday wearability, the women's Smith Lyric sunglasses combine nostalgic style with modern refinement and dependable, sun-blocking performance.
